name: Outside the Box (GottesSchaf)
description:
You're a test subject who has to go threw different puzzles where your task is to look at things in a way they doesn't seem like on first sight. The company behind this test environment is named Think Corp. and wants to see if you can think outside the box.

Controls:

Move - W, A, S, D

Jump - Space

Run - Hold Left Shift

Use Buttons / Pick up cube - Left Mouse Button, Right Mouse Button to throw it

Credits

  • Roman Skowronek (Code, Design, Art)
  • Royalty free stuff from the Internet
  • Florian Berger (First Advisor)
    • https://twitter.com/flberger
  • Hendrik Demmer (Second Advisor)

University of Applied Sciences Europe

This game was created at the Game Design // UE University of Applied Sciences Europe based in Berlin.
